headline: An Accent on Winning
abstract: The L.S.U. coach lifted his football team to No. 1 with his skill and challenged cultural stereotypes with his colorful voice.
lead_paragraph: When Louisiana State completed a rare victory over Alabama in November, my sister, Irene Cloud, kissed her tiger-striped fingernails. Then she pressed her hand to L.S.U. Coach Ed Orgeronâ€™s face on her television, which had been sprinkled with holy water for good luck.
